PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO energy level was determined by using oxidation onsets ( E ox ) of the polymer films.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO energy level |
| oxidation onsets (E ox) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO energy level |
| oxidation onsets (E ox) |

Note: In this context, "HOMO energy level" can be considered a material property as it is a characteristic of the polymer films. "Oxidation onsets (E ox)" can also be considered a material property as they refer to a specific behavior or response of the polymer films during oxidation.

| Property Value |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Note: HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) energy level is a material property, while oxidation onsets (E ox) refer to the energy levels at which oxidation processes begin, and are also material properties.
